```{r, include=FALSE}
require(here)
require(kableExtra)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE)

tab <- read.csv(here('data/schedule.csv'))

```


### Week 1: Introduction

```{r}

n=1

tab[n,] %>%
  kbl(format = 'html',
      escape = FALSE,
      col.names = c('Date','Notes','Kaggle Notebooks','Slides','Optional Reading','Assignments')) %>%
  kable_material(c("striped", "hover"),full_width = T)

```
